question: where is the north pole on the world map
api_result: The North Pole is located at the northernmost point on Earth, situated at 90 degrees North latitude. On a world map, it is typically represented at the top center of the map. However, it's important to note that the North Pole is not a landmass but rather an area of the Arctic Ocean covered by shifting sea ice. In contrast, the South Pole is located at 90 degrees South latitude in Antarctica.
